GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.35 to before v5.10.42
GSD.description:
mld: fix panic in mld_newpack()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.42 by commit beb39adb150f8f3b516ddf7c39835a9788704d23, it was introduced in version v2.6.35 by commit 72e09ad107e78d69ff4d3b97a69f0aad2b77280f. For more details please see the references link.
